UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Dual Antibacterial Activities and Biofilm Eradication of a Marine Peptide-N6NH 2 and Its Analogs against Multidrug-Resistant Aeromonas veronii.
Literature.Author: Li T, Wang Z, Han H, Teng D, Mao R, Hao Y, Yang N, Wang X, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas veronii ACCC 61732(MIC=8µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii X-1-06909(MIC=16µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii CL0901(MIC=16µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii ATCC 35624(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC O157(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1809(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1789(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 533(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CVCC 3377(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 546(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus hyicus NCTC 10350(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus hyicus(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans CMCC 98001(MIC=>128µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii ACCC 61732(MIC=16µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii ACCC 61732(MIC=4µg/ml),Aeromonas veronii ACCC 61732(MIC=>128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=128µg/ml)
